modName: Eli's Armoured Husky and Death Hounds
summary: 3 unique hound followers. One husky and 2 Death Hounds.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________[/center][center]
[b][color=#f1c232]Creators: Elianora, tumbajamba[/color][/b]

Mod adds three different armoured follower dogs, one armoured husky and two armoured death hounds. I made them essential because you know, AoE.

Koor (Summer) can be found in his camp near Windward Ruins and Dawnstar
Sunvaar (Beast) has his camp near [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Forebears'_Holdout]Forebear's Holdout cave[/url]
Norok (Fierce) is hanging out in "Serana's Room" in Castle Volkihar

[i][color=#dd7e6b]• All hounds will follow you when you first activate them, but if you already have an animal follower you cannot even talk to them.
This is due to how the scripts for the custom dialogue work.

• If you don't have an animal follower but the dogs are still unresponsive, just type "player.setanimalcount to 0" into the console.
If the dogs' dialogue doesn't work, try Quicksaving and Quickloading the game.

• They will use whatever textures for armours you have installed, or the hounds textures, the only thing you can't replace is the husky's fur. That comes from this mod.[/color]
[/i]
[color=#cc4125][size=4][b]:: REQUIREMENTS ::[/b][/size][/color]
- Skyrim up to date
- Dawnguard DLC

[b][color=#e06666][size=4]:: RECOMMENDED MODS ::[/size][/color][/b]
• If you want to rename the hounds, use[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/?] Jaxonz Renamer [/url](Koor's Dialogue won't change though, it will still say Koor in your dialogue)
• You can tell them to a new home with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home Is Your Home[/url] mod and if you want them to sandbox to other floors, use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple Floors Sandboxing[/url]

[b][size=4][color=#a61c00]:: CREDITS AND THANKS ::[/color]
[/size][/b]Tumbajamba for the armoured hound meshes
Darkfox127 for his advanced followers tutorial and scripts
Aenkill HD fur texture and eyes for the husky

[color=#e06666][size=4][b]:: PERMISSIONS ::[/b][/size][/color]
Check the permissions tab

[b][color=#cc4125][size=4]:: FAQ ::
[/size][/color][/b]
Q: Koor/Sunvaar/Norok is not following me and I can't talk to him!!!111oneone
A: Set your animal follower count to 0 (console [i]set playeranimalcount to 0[/i]). Also try quicksaving and quickloading.
